thread.title: Children under 18 to pay half-price for holiday performances of Metropolitan Opera - Music
thread.title_full: Children under 18 to pay half-price for holiday performances of Metropolitan Opera - Music - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Children under 18 to pay half-price for holiday performances of Metropolitan Opera - Music
text:
MUSIC: The Met offering half-price holiday tickets for young opera-goers 
The Metropolitan Opera has announced special programming and promotions for the holiday season. From Thanksgiving through Dec. 30, audience members 18 and younger pay half-price for holiday performances of "Die Fledermaus" (premieres Dec. 4 to Jan. 7) and "The Barber of Seville" (premieres Dec. 16 to Jan. 2). Information: metopera.org.
â€” Raymond A. Edel
